venue.name: Bond Bar at The Langham Hotel

item.description:
Its time for the Chocolate Bar again!! For chocolate lovers, this is a dream come true. The chocolate bar has "more than 125 chocolate desserts, including chocolate mousses, specialty cakes, made-to-order chocolate crêpes, homemade ice cream, fresh baked cookies, milk chocolate passion fruit tarts, miniature s'more cups, cotton candy, delicate truffles, donut machine, homemade waffles with chocolate fondue and more."

This years theme is "the five elements of taste" featuring chocolate delights that are salty, sour, bitter, sweet and savory.

Here is a link to the menu: http://boston.langhamhotels.com/pdf/chocolate_bar_22_tlbos_en.pdf

Please note that there is no other food served besides the chocolate bar. So, don't come expecting to be able to eat non-desert type food.

The cost for the buffet will be $50.00 per person. This included the buffet, gratuity and a service fee.

This will be a joint event with the Social Fun Meetup.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Langham Hotel Chocolate Bar
